## Getting Started

```{r setup}
library(regexcite)
library(ggplot2)
data(mtcars)
```

## Visualize Dataset

```{r dataset}
mtcars |> head()
```

## Plot Data

```{r plot, echo=FALSE}

mtcars |>
  ggplot(aes(mpg, hp))+
  geom_point()

```
